PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12152024-11-14PMO
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of ANNIE LAFLEUR, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office), effective June 4, 2024, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office).
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the remuneration of ANNIE LAFLEUR, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office), effective June 4, 2024, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office).
